channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13656] need to set direct memory limit higher in LlapServiceDriver for certain edge case configurations
item.summary: need to set direct memory limit higher in LlapServiceDriver for certain edge case configurations

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
gopalv sseth can you take a look?

sumitmohanty fyi

vikram.dixit can you take a look? Both Gopal and Sid are out

Does this need to factor in xmx being set in MB in the java part of service driver, and without in the python bit. (maybe that's already being done and I missed it).
ie. daemon_args = " -XX:MaxDirectMemorySize=%s %s" % (max_direct_memory,
or daemon_args = " -XX:MaxDirectMemorySize=%sm %s" % (max_direct_memory,
No, it sets the value as is in bytes
hagleitn vikram.dixit can you review instead?

Don't you want this

long maxDirect = (xmx > 0 && cache > 0 && xmx < cache * 1.25) ? (long)(cache * 1.25) : -1;

to be:

long maxDirect = (xmx > 0 && cache > 0 && xmx < cache * 1.25) ? (long)(cache * 1.25) : xmx;
After talking with Sergey, it looks like this is what we have to do for max direct memory to be used properly. +1 for the patch.
Committed to master. Thanks for the review!
This patch is broken all over the place
vikram.dixit can you take a look at the addendum patch? Thanks
Committed the addendum. Tested all the scenarios on the cluster now, not just the main one Thanks for the review.
